item.description: Site Details For more details on how I’ve set this up, see my Github page. I do not, and will never collect information from users who visit this website. I don’t know that you’ve been here, but your ISP does.
Upcoming: A Study in Surveillance Realism Have thoughts or readings on the topic? Send them my way!
Do you have things I should read? Did I get something wrong, or did I miss something important? Educate me! Send me an email at: elijah@electiveanxiety.com
